text: Metropolitan Jovan Pavlović (, ; 22 October 1936 - 3 April 2014) was a Croatian religious leader. He was the Metropolitan of Metropolitanate of Zagreb and Ljubljana of Serbian Orthodox Church. He was born in Medinci, Kingdom of Yugoslavia. Pavlović died on 3 April 2014 at the Sisters of Charity Hospital in Zagreb, Croatia. He was 78 years old. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Eastern Orthodox bishops Category:Deaths from disease Category:People from Zagreb
title: Jovan Pavlović
